enhancedPrompt.enhancedPrompt: Generate an image featuring a dramatic scene embodying the essence of technology. The image should be filled with neon lights, glowing elements, and futuristic tech symbols. The main focus should be an eye-catching, illuminated tech icon or gadget on the right side of the image. The image should have a dramatic tone, with a dark background to emphasize the neon elements. Incorporate linear patterns or matrix-style digital rain for an added technological feel.
enhancedPrompt.styleGuide: The style should be cyberpunk or futuristic, with a heavy emphasis on neon aesthetics. Use bold, glowing lines and shapes to depict technology-related symbols or gadgets. The lighting should be dramatic, with the main light source originating from the neon elements themselves, casting dynamic shadows throughout the image. Use bokeh effects to depict distant city lights or other tech elements in the background.
enhancedPrompt.colorPalette: The color scheme should be dominated by neon shades of blue, purple, and pink against a dark, almost black background. The contrast between these bright colors and the dark background should create a feeling of depth and drama. Use white or very light gray for any text or important symbols to ensure they stand out against the vibrant background.
enhancedPrompt.composition: The image should be designed for both horizontal (1280x720) and vertical (1080x1920) formats. The main tech icon or gadget should be placed on the right side of the image, leaving space on the left for text or other informational elements. The background should have a sense of depth, with various technology-themed elements layered in a way that guides the viewer's eye towards the main focal point.

promptVariations: Generate a visual scene that encapsulates the spirit of advanced technology. The image should be drenched in a palette of vibrant neon hues and radiating elements, imbued with symbols signifying futuristic technology. Place a visually striking, luminescent tech emblem or device towards the right-hand side of the image to serve as the primary point of interest. The scene should express a theatrical mood, against a backdrop of obsidian shades to augment the neon components. Integrate geometric sequences or cascading digital torrents in the style of the Matrix for an enhanced technological ambiance.
